markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cartographer's Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=847)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 34</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Players can gain access to faction-specific gear by taking the corresponding Faction Gear Access Game Reward, available when they reach 20 reputation with the respective faction._

**Price** 42 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This kit includes a [writing set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63), a [compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16), a [standard astrolabe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=846), a [ruler](/Equipment.aspx?ID=849), and a [survey map](/Equipment.aspx?ID=65).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cartographer's Kit
